data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Pinus sylvestris (Scotch pine) from sample NYUCHPPS-192

Exposition E, Slope 8 deg, Geology: Podsolsand, krüml. fri. Sand, av. Tree height 21 m, Tree cover 70%, Shrub cover 3%, Herb cover 70%, Moss cover 90%, Vegatation type: Pinetum fruticuloso-hylocomiosum, Film number: 934A
